Package GUI

Class MyFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • GUI.MyFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.util.EventListener

    public final class MyFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener
    Singleton the main Window of the game. have default window size of 1433x642
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
